薼字的基本解释

薼
chén
〔??薼〕一种中药草。亦作“茵陈”。

薼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chén］
［《集韻》池鄰切，平真，澄。］
草名。可入药。

薼字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　薼； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1063第12
【集韻】池鄰切，音陳。與蔯同。【類篇】䓰薼菜。【正字通】茵蔯別作茵薼。茵字作艸下囙。

薼字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
薼字的起名意思

暂无。

Glutinous rice
Basic explanation of words
Glutinous rice
chén
〔??薼〕A kind of Chinese herbal medicine. Also known as "Yin Chen".
Glutinous rice
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chén］
["Ji Yun" Chi is next to each other, plain and clear. ]
Cursive name. Can be used as medicine.
Glutinous rice
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　薼; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1063 Page 12
[Ji Yun] Chi neighboring cut, sound Chen. Same as 蔯. 【Classes】Cereals. 【Zhengzitong】Don’t make yin 蔯. The yin word is made of 艸下囙.
